lite.title: Price Recommender LITE
lite.subtitle: Daily recommendations without guessing
lite.description: LITE considers local demand (historical and future), weekly and annual seasonality, holidays, weather, cancellations, booking pace and other factors to provide optimal price recommendations.

pro.title: Price Recommender PRO
pro.subtitle: Full market and hotel data overview
pro.description: PRO expands capabilities with competitor price and occupancy analysis, local occupancy, and powerful reports from Amazon QuickSight and Dataria system analytics. Both you and Price Recommender Pro benefit from this data for better recommendations.

market.title: Full insight into your market
items: Compare your prices against average competitor prices
